overview.title: Why Our IV Lounge Feels Different
overview.content: We projected the energy of the old drsnaclinic.com IV page into a new elevated space. Each infusion is mixed-to-measure—think glutathione glow boosts, immune armour, adrenal calm, or travel reset blends. Throughout your drip we monitor vitals, offer guided breath-work or noise-cancelling headphones, and serve mineral-rich teas so the ritual feels indulgent as well as clinical.

faq.question: Will I need a consultation first?
faq.answer: Yes, new patients enjoy a 20-minute medical review or can share recent blood work so we can tailor the infusion safely.

faq.question: Can IV therapy be combined with Medicinal Weight Management?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Many patients pair appetite-regulating medication with weekly drips to maintain hydration and electrolytes.

faq.question: How often should I book?
faq.answer: Frequent flyers visit every 7-10 days, while others use IV therapy as a monthly reset. We'll design a cadence that fits your schedule.
